main event: On the night of 25 November 1957, an unidentified flying object was reported hovering over a mountain in Seoul, Korea.
interesting points: The object was considered to be an illusion created by it moving away in the observer's line of sight., The sighting lasted for 2.5 seconds and included all characteristics of motion., The report was part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program for investigating UFOs., The signing officer was SP-1 George H. Tyson., The evaluation concluded no conclusive evidence was found, labelled as 0 results.
